title: Sri Lanka: Education authorities to discuss limiting school days
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Education Authorities are to decide on limiting school days, given the present crisis in the country.
Secretary of the Ceylon Teachers Service Union, Mahinda Jayasinghe speaking to News 1st said that trade unions will be meeting the Education Minister on Friday (10).
A series of proposals on limiting school days will be discussed at the meeting.
Jayasinghe said that a fuel crisis had directly had an impact on children, as transportation is not accessible to many.
